bug.author: vadimkantorov
bug.summary: boto3 CreateBucket fails if region is "us-east-1"
bug.description:
If us-east-1 is used as region, spotty start fails with: <denchmark-code>Error: ------ An error occurred (InvalidLocationConstraint) when calling the CreateBucket operation: The specified location-constraint is not valid </denchmark-code>
The solution is to fix <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apls777/spotty/blob/master/spotty/providers/aws/deployment/project_resources/bucket.py#L31-L32>https://github.com/apls777/spotty/blob/master/spotty/providers/aws/deployment/project_resources/bucket.py#L31-L32</denchmark-link> as if self._region != 'us-east-1': self._s3.create_bucket(ACL='private', Bucket=bucket_name, CreateBucketConfiguration={'LocationConstraint': self._region}) else: self._s3.create_bucket(ACL='private', Bucket=bucket_name) The boto3 issue is decribed in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/boto/boto3/issues/125>boto/boto3#125</denchmark-link>
Also, thanks for the great project ^^

comments.comment: Thank you for this bug report! I'll fix it with the next release.
